education.field: Computer Science, Data Science, Mathematics, Engineering, or related fields

soft_skills.name: Verbal and written communication skills in English
Ability to collaborate effectively in a team-oriented environment
Strong desire to learn and explore new technologies

responsibilities.description: Develop and fine-tune machine learning models and algorithms
Preprocess, clean, and organize data for analysis and modeling
Conduct exploratory data analysis (EDA) and create insightful visualizations
Research emerging trends in artificial intelligence to support ongoing projects
Test, validate, and optimize AI models to ensure high performance
Collaborate with team members to integrate AI solutions into larger systems
Document work, including experiments, processes, and results

preferred_qualifications.description: Willingness to research and stay updated on advancements in Generative AI and related fields
Willingness to research and stay updated on advancements in Computer Vision and related fields
Eagerness to adapt and apply new knowledge in real-world projects
